<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="Portfolio">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/a4e17c3cf20eda684061d667ba19db82920d6ca3/sdk/nodejs/servicecatalog/portfolio.ts#L24">class <b>Portfolio</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>extends</span> <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResource'>CustomResource</a></pre>
{{% md %}}

Provides a resource to create a Service Catalog Portfolio.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const portfolio = new aws.servicecatalog.Portfolio("portfolio", {
    description: "List of my organizations apps",
    providerName: "Brett",
});
```

> This content is derived from https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/blob/master/website/docs/r/servicecatalog_portfolio.html.markdown.

{{% /md %}}
